Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HPROVIDER

The basic type HPROVIDER is a handle to an available RIB provider.

Discussion

HPROVIDER handles are returned from the AIL_enumerate_filters and AIL_enumerate_3D_providers functions.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_3D_distance_factor, AIL_3D_doppler_factor, AIL_3D_provider_attribute, AIL_3D_rolloff_factor, AIL_3D_room_type, AIL_3D_speaker_type, AIL_active_3D_sample_count, AIL_allocate_3D_sample_handle, AIL_close_3D_provider, AIL_enumerate_3D_providers, AIL_enumerate_filter_attributes, AIL_enumerate_filter_sample_attributes, AIL_enumerate_filters, AIL_filter_attribute, AIL_open_3D_listener, AIL_open_3D_object, AIL_open_3D_provider, AIL_open_filter, AIL_set_3D_distance_factor, AIL_set_3D_doppler_factor, AIL_set_3D_provider_preference, AIL_set_3D_rolloff_factor, AIL_set_3D_room_type, AIL_set_3D_speaker_type, AIL_set_DLS_processor, AIL_set_digital_driver_processor, AIL_set_filter_preference, AIL_set_sample_processor, AIL_set_stream_processor
